thread.title: Watch: Pats WR Julian Edelman impersonates Brady, Belichick
thread.title_full: Watch: Pats WR Julian Edelman impersonates Brady, Belichick

title: Watch: Pats WR Julian Edelman impersonates Brady, Belichick
text:
Patriots WR Julian Edelman impersonates Tom Brady, Bill Belichick Interview part of upcoming ESPN E:60 show Published 4:30 PM EDT Oct 23, 2015 Photos ESPN/E:60 
Fans love New England Patriots wide receiver Julian Edelman for his intense play on the football field. 
But he's a man of many different talents. 
He's shown how skilled he is marketing himself on social media, is not afraid to answer questions about himself from random strangers and is incredibly comfortable in front of the camera. 
Edelman was interviewed by ESPN for an upcoming E:60 episode, and the preview shows how much fun he can be when he's not being yelled at by coaches on the football field. 
Based on what we've seen, he may have a future career in comedy as well. 
Hit the link below to watch him talk about traveling across the country for Tom Brady and his impression of the future Hall of Fame quarterback, as well as future Hall of Fame head coach Bill Belichick.
